verses.name: Psalms 65:5
verses.text: By terrible things in righteousness wilt thou answer us, O God of our salvation; who art the confidence of all the ends of the earth, and of them that are afar off upon the sea:

verses.name: Psalms 65:6
verses.text: Which by his strength setteth fast the mountains; being girded with power:

verses.name: Psalms 65:7
verses.text: Which stilleth the noise of the seas, the noise of their waves, and the tumult of the people.

verses.name: Psalms 65:8
verses.text: They also that dwell in the uttermost parts are afraid at thy tokens: thou makest the outgoings of the morning and evening to rejoice.
